title: Fabrication of biological cushioning materials with natural wood structure by an ionic liquid-based sustainable chemistry approach
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00097H, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hiroki Sakagami, Tetsuya Tsuda
While retaining wood characteristics, elastic softened wood was fabricated by the partial removal of lignin and hemicellulose from C. japonica wood without morphological change during a simple ionic liquid-based sustainable chemistry approach.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
